mapper.insert: insert into SYSTEM_MENU (ID, PARENT_ID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, URL, PERMISSION, ICON, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values (MENU_ID.nextVal, #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select ID, PARENT_ID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, URL, PERMISSION, ICON, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE from SYSTEM_MENU
select ID, PARENT_ID, NAME, SORT, TYPE, URL, PERMISSION, ICON, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE from SYSTEM_MENU WHERE PERMISSION=#{permission}
mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.PARENT_ID, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.URL, a.permission, a.icon, a.STATUS, a.DESCRIPTION, a.CREATEDATE, a.UPDATEDATE FROM SYSTEM_MENU a
mapper.select: inner JOIN SYSTEM_ROLE_MENU rm ON rm.PERMISSION_ID = a.id inner JOIN SYSTEM_ROLE r ON r.id = rm.ROLE_ID AND r.STATUS = '1' inner JOIN SYSTEM_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.ROLE_ID = r.id inner JOIN SYSTEM_USERS u ON u.id = ur.USER_ID AND u.STATUS='1' AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.STATUS = '1' ORDER BY a.sort
inner JOIN SYSTEM_MENU b ON b.ID= a.PARENT_ID WHERE a.STATUS = '1' AND b.PERMISSION=#{1} ORDER BY a.sort
inner JOIN SYSTEM_ROLE_MENU rm ON rm.PERMISSION_ID = a.id and rm.status='1' inner JOIN SYSTEM_ROLE r ON r.id = rm.ROLE_ID AND r.STATUS = '1' and r.id = #{roleId} WHERE a.STATUS = '1' ORDER BY a.sort
